00011 #include <windows.h>

00013 //General typedefs
00014 typedef unsigned char BYTE;
00015 typedef unsigned short WORD;
00016 
00017 //Macros to make the following a lot easier
00018 #define REG_FUNCS1(n32, n16, n8hi, n8lo, idx) \
00019         DWORD get_ ## n32 ()\
00020                 { return regs[idx]; }\
00021         WORD get_## n16 ()\
00022                 { return (WORD)(regs[idx] & 0xFFFF); }\
00023         BYTE get_## n8hi ()\
00024                 { return (BYTE)((regs[idx] & 0xFFFF) >> 8); }\
00025         BYTE get_## n8lo ()\
00026                 { return (BYTE)(regs[idx] & 0xFF); }\
00027         void set_## n32 (DWORD value)\
00028                 { regs[idx] = value; }\
00029         void set_## n16 (WORD value)\
00030                 { ((WORD*)&regs[idx])[0] = value; }\
00031         void set_## n8hi (BYTE value)\
00032                 { ((BYTE*)&regs[idx])[1] = value; }\
00033         void set_## n8lo (BYTE value)\
00034                 { ((BYTE*)&regs[idx])[0] = value; }\
00035         template <typename T> inline void SetEx_## n32(T value)\
00036                 { regs[idx] = reinterpret_cast<DWORD>(value); }
00037 
00038 #define REG_FUNCS2(n32, n16, idx)\
00039         DWORD get_ ## n32 ()\
00040                 { return regs[idx]; }\
00041         WORD get_## n16 ()\
00042                 { return (WORD)(regs[idx] & 0xFFFF); }\
00043         void set_## n32 (DWORD value)\
00044                 { regs[idx] = value; }\
00045         void set_## n16 (WORD value)\
00046                 { ((WORD*)&regs[idx])[0] = value; }
00047 
00048 //A pointer to this class is passed as an argument to EXPORT functions
00049 class REGISTERS
00050 {
00051 private:
00052         DWORD   origin;
00053         DWORD   flags;
00054         DWORD   regs[8];
00055 
00056 public:
00057         REG_FUNCS1(EAX, AX, AH, AL, 7);
00058         REG_FUNCS1(ECX, CX, CH, CL, 6);
00059         REG_FUNCS1(EDX, DX, DH, DL, 5);
00060         REG_FUNCS1(EBX, BX, BH, BL, 4);
00061         REG_FUNCS2(ESP, SP, 3);
00062         REG_FUNCS2(EBP, BP, 2);
00063         REG_FUNCS2(ESI, SI, 1);
00064         REG_FUNCS2(EDI, DI, 0);
00065 
00066         DWORD get_Origin()
00067                 { return origin; }
00068 
00069         DWORD get_EFLAGS()
00070                 { return flags; }
00071         void set_EFLAGS(DWORD value)
00072                 { flags = value; }
00073 
00074         DWORD lea_StackVar(int offset)
00075                 { return regs[3] + offset; }
00076         DWORD get_StackVar32(int offset)
00077                 { return *((DWORD*)regs[3] + (offset >> 2)); }
00078         WORD get_StackVar16(int offset)
00079                 { return *((WORD*)regs[3] + (offset >> 1)); }
00080         BYTE get_StackVar8(int offset)
00081                 { return *((BYTE*)regs[3] + offset); }
00082         void set_StackVar32(int offset, DWORD value)
00083                 { *((DWORD*)regs[3] + (offset >> 2)) = value; }
00084         void set_StackVar16(int offset, WORD value)
00085                 { *((WORD*)regs[3] + (offset >> 1)) = value; }
00086         void set_StackVar8(int offset, BYTE value)
00087                 { *((BYTE*)regs[3] + offset) = value; }
00088 
00089         DWORD lea_BaseVar(int offset)
00090                 { return regs[2] + offset; }
00091         DWORD get_BaseVar32(int offset)
00092                 { return *((DWORD*)regs[2] + (offset >> 2)); }
00093         WORD get_BaseVar16(int offset)
00094                 { return *((WORD*)regs[2] + (offset >> 1)); }
00095         BYTE get_BaseVar8(int offset)
00096                 { return *((BYTE*)regs[2] + offset); }
00097         void set_BaseVar32(int offset, DWORD value)
00098                 { *((DWORD*)regs[2] + (offset >> 2)) = value; }
00099         void set_BaseVar16(int offset, WORD value)
00100                 { *((WORD*)regs[2] + (offset >> 1)) = value; }
00101         void set_BaseVar8(int offset, BYTE value)
00102                 { *((BYTE*)regs[2] + offset) = value; }
00103 };
00104 
00105 //Use this for DLL export functions
00106 //e.g. EXPORT FunctionName(REGISTERS* R)
00107 #define EXPORT extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) DWORD _cdecl
00108 #define EXPORT_FUNC(name) extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) DWORD _cdecl name (REGISTERS *R)
00109 
00110 // injgen
00111 // in addition to the injgen-declaration, also includes the function opening
00112 #define DEFINE_HOOK(hook, funcname, size) EXPORT_FUNC(funcname)
00113 // no function opening, use for injgen-decl when repeating the same hook at multiple addrs
00114 #define DEFINE_HOOK_AGAIN(hook, funcname, size)
00115 
00116 #endif
